“Canada should not be taking the COVAX vaccine from poor nations to alleviate political pressures at home." @Diana_Sarosi Policy Director @Oxfam 

IF THIS IS WHAT Trudeau's being 'on track' entails, then the #vaccinerollout is a shambles.
